item.title: Brandon Bennett
item.description: I am a Network Engineering Manager at Facebook focusing on building network automation and network tooling. I am a huge fan of Go programming language and have tried to promote it has much as possible both personally and professionally. I am a german car fan. I enjoy tinkering with electronics, 3dprinting, and home automation. Contact Email: me@brbe.net Linkedin: brandonrbennett Facebook: brandonr.robert.bennett Instagram: nemith Twitter: @brandonrbennett Github: nemith
